sentences.en: A general schematic view of a data storage and retrieval system is given in Fig 1 - 1 .
sentences.cn: 数据存储和检索系统的总框图见图 1-1.

sentences.en: a new system that should speed up information retrieval
sentences.cn: 能加速信息检索的新系统

sentences.en: A special retrieval team arrived from Washington and located the crashed craft.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿的一支修复队驻扎在闪电地点.

sentences.en: In addition to calculations, the most frequent use for a compute is probably " information retrieval ".
sentences.cn: 除了 计算工作 以外, 计算机最的用途大概是资料检索.

sentences.en: In addition to calculations, the most frequent use for a computer is probably " information retrieval ".
sentences.cn: 除了计算工作以外, 计算机最常的用途大概是资料检索.

sentences.en: In the physical world, both the retrieval system and the storage system may be very labor - intensive.
sentences.cn: 在物理世界中, 检索系统和存储系统都是劳动密集的系统.

sentences.en: Instead, we hand the user the storage system and call it a retrieval system.
sentences.cn: 取而代之, 我们把这个存储系统直接交给了使用者,并把它称为“检索系统”.

sentences.en: Its real purpose is the launching and retrieval of small aeroplanes in flight.
sentences.cn: 它真正的用途是发射和收回飞行中的小型飞机。

sentences.en: Not collected, even the most clever retrieval techniques cannot recover them for use in the present.
sentences.cn: 如不加以收集, 就是最先进的补救技术也不能使它恢复以供当前使用.

sentences.en: Once again , the key is separating the storage and retrieval systems.
sentences.cn: 关键是分离存储系统和检索系统.

sentences.en: The following listing summarizes the more common retrieval programs.
sentences.cn: 下表概述了较常用的检索程序.

sentences.en: The shelves and numbers are the storage system. The card indices are the retrieval system.
sentences.cn: 书架和书号是存储系统, 卡片索引是检索系统.

sentences.en: The ship was buried, beyond retrieval, at the bottom of the sea.
sentences.cn: 船已葬身海底，无法打捞。

sentences.en: When you have to check the records, the computer provides instant retrieval.
sentences.cn: 要想查看记录, 电脑能立即提供检索.

sentences.en: With this information, we can structure storage and retrieval systems that accommodate specific purposes.
sentences.cn: 有了这些信息, 我们就可以构建存储和检索系统来达到这个特定的目的.

sentences.en: Yet, we still use the same old metaphors and retrieval models to manage our data.
sentences.cn: 但是, 我们仍然使用相同的隐喻和检索模型管理我们的数据.

words.tran_cn: 可取回的；可补偿的；可检索的
（训练成能寻回猎物的）猎犬；取回的人

phrases.tran_cn: 数据检索；资料检索；资料信息

trans.tran_en: the act of getting back something you have lost or left somewhere
